classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B2, C1, C21, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5 and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.

Select 12 units from Track A or Track B. Only students who are pursuing a Data Science minor should select Track B.

Track A: MATH335, MATH406, MATH409, MATH414, MATH416, MATH418, MATH437, MATH452, MATH453, MATH460, MATH476, or MATH461 & MATH462

Track B: DATA301, DATA401; MATH335 or MATH453. Track B students should select the Statistics Category for their Approved Electives.
